title: The Best of Southern Living Cookbook: Over 500 of Our All-Time Favorite Recipes
description: No one knows the South better than Southern Living , and no one knows food better than the magazines Test Kitchens Professionals and Food Editors. They tasted their way to culinary bliss while compiling this best-ever collection, and now you can, too! Each recipe, over 500 in all, was handpicked for this book based on the following Earned a high rating in the Test KitchensNamed a reader favorite recipe based on calls, letters, e-mails, and comments on southernliving.comVoted most popular among the Southern Living Food Staff--these are the recipes they cook for their families and friends
author: Southern Living Inc.
